did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: AFL-CIO Sub-Committee to Clarify Language of Section 3, Article XXI of Constitution Transcript, 1964

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations (AFL-CIO)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of a transcript of proceedings of the AFL-CIO Subcommittee meeting to clarify language of Section 3 of Article XXI, on April 20, 1964.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a transcript of proceedings of the AFL-CIO Subcommittee meeting to clarify language of Section 3 of Article XXI, on April 20, 1964.
